Multiple Regression and Confounding

Because life isnâ€™t bivariate

11/06 - 11/12

Learning Path

Where weâ€™ve been

Learning how a third variable can modify the relationship between two explanatory and response variables.

Where weâ€™re at

Learning how to expand regression models to include more than 1 predictor, and how to fit other non-linear regression models.

Objectives

Items

Calculate and interpret estimates for multiple slopes in multiple regression models

Fit multiple regression models with categorical variables.

Fit a model with a log transformed outcome and interpret the results

Fit a model with a binary outcome and interpret the results

Calculate and interpret confidence and prediction intervals for the slope value

Interpret effects of categorical predictors on regression outcomes

Visually assess assumptions of regression models
